mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PASSWORD, GENDER, DATE_BIRTH, HP, SMSSTS_YN, EMAIL, EMAILSTS_YN, ZIPCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, NAMUJI_ADDRESS, POINT, JOIN_DT ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{dateBirth}, #{hp}, #{smsstsYn}, #{email}, #{emailstsYn}, #{zipCode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{namujiAddress}, 0, NOW() )
